content: /18/ The ‘Public Interest Decree’ promulgated by the President of Cote d’lvoire /19/ | the Right of use: legal title to the flooded land >> Arrete IntMinist_Bareme Indemnisation Cultures (which evidences the indemnisation of relocated lands’ owners, while the Public Utility decree grants state ownership/requisition of the flooded land). /20/ Supportive for the area of the reservoir: Loi HSV_Centrale Soubré_vF.pdf (abacus/framework in application for water level & superficy equivalence, at nominal height of CRN = 152,00 m), abacus was determined by SinoHydro (EPC Contractor) during the water filling of the dam, under the supervision of Tractebel engineering (Consulting Company). /21/ The detailed environmental impact assessment was submitted to the Direction of Environment in February 2015 and approved by ANDE decree n°0078 of August 21st, 2015. /22/ SOUBRE HYDROELECTRIC DEVELOPMENT ENVIRONMENTAL AND SOCIAL IMPACT STUDY, ENVIRONMENTAL AND SOCIAL MANAGEMENT PLAN, September 2019 /23/ Calibration certificates of all the 8 energy meters installed at power house and at substation dated December 2022 by central direction of energy transport and telecommunications sub- direction maintenance / control department of CIE (Government authority) /24/ /25/ List of employees, wages Previous verification (3rd periodic verification) Verification report and Monitoring Report /26/ https://registry.verra.org/app/projectDetail/VCS/1522 Supportive for the higher generation:
